verses.name: Psalms 76:1
verses.text: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

verses.name: Psalms 76:2
verses.text: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

verses.name: Psalms 76:3
verses.text: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 76:4
verses.text: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

verses.name: Psalms 76:5
verses.text: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

verses.name: Psalms 76:6
verses.text: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

verses.name: Psalms 76:7
verses.text: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

verses.name: Psalms 76:8
verses.text: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

verses.name: Psalms 76:9
verses.text: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 76:10
verses.text: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

verses.name: Psalms 76:11
verses.text: Vow, and pay unto the Lord your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

verses.name: Psalms 76:12
verses.text: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
